name: ILP2-Unity-Mitchell-O'Brien
description:
How to Play:

Use WASD to Move.

Use the Spacebar to Jump!

Press LeftShift to spawn a box!

Move the boxes by Left Clicking on them and Holding!

Objective:

Help BlueDude get to the exit by building him a path using boxes!

Experiment with other ways to win. There is not one correct answer.

Note:

You can spawn as many boxes as you want!

Going fullscreen breaks the UI for some reason. 

(Note to prof: Although movement is done with WASD, the main way of interacting is with the mouse. Without it, the game cannot be played.)
